data.title: Stephen King Home Gates with Bats
data.meta_description: Stephen King is a world famous author from Bangor, Maine. Many of his books have been made into movies. This shows his home along with the much spoken off bats on his property gates.
data.text:
Stephen King Home - Bangor, Maine

Notice the bats on the gates? This can only be one home in Bangor, Maine - the home of one of the world's most famous and likely the most prolific authors - Stephen King. People often stop by here to be photographed in front of the gates and home or to take their own. Stephen is a long time “Maine boy” as it is referred to here and someone in whom the Maine people are quite proud of.

Photo# Stephen King 1873
